channel.title: Minimal Blog
channel.description: A minimal, elegant blog built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

item.title: Accessibility First - Building for Everyone
item.description: Learn how to create inclusive web experiences that work for all users, regardless of ability or device.

item.title: Web Performance - A Practical Guide
item.description: Learn practical techniques to make your website faster, more responsive, and better for users.

item.title: Modern CSS Features You Should Be Using
item.description: Discover the latest CSS features that can simplify your stylesheets and enhance your web designs.

item.title: Building a Minimal Blog with Vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
item.description: A comprehensive guide to creating a fast, elegant, and framework-free blog that can be hosted on GitHub Pages.

item.title: Creating a Design System with CSS Custom Properties
item.description: Learn how to build scalable, maintainable design systems using CSS variables and a systematic approach to styling.

item.title: Typography Matters - A Guide to Beautiful Web Text
item.description: Master the art of web typography to create readable, beautiful, and accessible text content.
